description:
Track and evaluate the performance of your investment portfolio across stocks, cryptocurrencies, and other assets.


- New: Added dashboard widget for upcoming dividend events (ex-date and payment date).
- New: Added PDF importers for Bundesschatz, Anadi Bank, and Nord LB (Norddeutsche Landesbank).
- Improvement: Enhanced PDF importers for Scalable Capital, Trade Republic, DKB, Comdirect, flatexDEGIRO, BaaderBank, BoursoBank, ArkeaDirectBank, Santander Consumer Bank, Saxo Bank, Hypothekarbank Lenzburg, Tradegate, Questrade, apoBank, Audi Bank, Volkswagen Bank, and Nordax Bank.
- Fix: Corrected pie chart display when an instrument is shared between classifications.
